name: The Dragon
details: Order online or email for more information. Local home and postal delivery.
alt: A banner with the text order online for home and postal delivery

name: All Strung Out Fine Yarns and Fibre Arts
details: Order online or call 226-820-3766. Shipping, curbside pickup, and delivery within Guelph area.

name: The Bookshelf
details: The Bookstore will still be accessible via telephone, website and social media, and we will continue to offer free delivery on in-stock books and merchandise within Guelph.

name: Fresh Box Market
details: Weekly fresh produce box. Order early due to high demand. Pickup Thursdays from 12-7pm. Delivery to Fergus, Elora, Guelph, Elmira, Rockwood, Drayton, Alma, Moorefield, Arthur, Puslinch, Orangeville, Erin, Hillsburgh, Caledon, Mono, Shelburne, Grand Valley, Belwood.
alt: A lineup of vegetables on a white background

name: Speed River Bicycle
details: Continuing sales via website, email, and phone. Continuing to offer bicycle service & repair through pick up service.
alt: A group photo of the Speed River Bicycle staff

name: Guelph Box
goods: A box of local favourites delivered to your doorstep.
details: A surprise box made up of products from local businesses directly affected by the COVID-19 crisis. Delivery within Guelph on specified days.
alt: A shelf with baskets of produce

name: Sweet
details: Offering a variety of candy bags for delivery in partnership with The Dragon. See Facebook page for more info. You can get your candy, comics and games delivered together! Order candy via Facebook Messenger or email: Meowguelph@gmail.com. Minimum order $25.

name: Play With Clay
details: Delivering home pottery kits and clay in Guelph. Also offering live-stream tutorials!
alt: Three plants in ceramic pots and the text 'take-home pottery kits delivery only'

name: Brothers Brewing Company
details: Order online. Free Guelph delivery with coupon code. Select delivery days for other areas can be found on their social media.
alt: A long bar and bar tables inside Brothers Brewing Company

name: Tomme Cheese Shop
details: We REMAIN OPEN as an essential service for curbside pick up and delivery. Shop online or call us at (519) 763-6552.

name: Bliss Dough
goods: Bliss Dough was started in Guelph, ON and creates jars of ready-to-eat cookie dough in a variety of fantastic flavours! Our flour is heat-treated and we donâ€™t use eggs so you can enjoy this guilty pleasure worry-free!
details: Delivery is available on an ongoing basis, but curbside pick-ups are organised on specific days.

name: Feng's Dumplings
goods: Frozen dumplings and spring rolls, and sauces
details: Offering online ordering through website form while Guelph Farmer's Market is closed. Free delivery for orders over $35. Otherwise, there will be a $5 delivery fee.

name: Harmony Meadows Alpaca
details: Free local delivery in Guelph and Wellington County
alt: A group of alpacas in a field

name: The Bloom Room Floral Company
details: Taking online orders and orders by phone. Free delivery on local online orders. Some arrangements may have limited availablity due to shipping delays, Florist's Choice is recommended.

name: Planet Bean Coffee
goods: Locally roasted fair trade organic coffee
details: Coffee beans available at Valeriote's Market, The Stone Store Natural Foods, Market Fresh Guelph, Goodness Me! Natural Food Market, Longo's, Thatcher Farms Butcher Shop, Bakery and Farm Market, Grocery Gateway, Mosborough Country Market
alt: A shelf with packaged Planet Bean coffee
